title: I got banned for being called a ni****
body:
Below I copy-pasted my support ticket i submitted after it happened because it pretty much sums up the event.  Please upvote this so Riot can see this messed up situation.  Lux was also being toxic and saying how she wanted us to lose the game.

Hey guys, I am an African American male who got wrongfully banned. I was recently referred to as a "niggo" in champion select, and understandingly it really titled me. I wanted to flame the crap out of our mid laner who called me that and banned my champ, but i restrained myself(I did lose a lot of hope in winning the game because we were way down and they were in our base, but the whole team had lost faith and certainly this is not permabannable especially considering the circumstances). I asked the other team to report her for calling me a "%%%%%%" (I typed the word out so they could understand the severity of the issue). I assume this is why I ended up getting permabanned. my username is "jakobe1996", ign "crown TSM". Eng√Øneer is the player who called me a "niggo". If you have capability of checking chat logs in champ select, you are easily able to tell. I have been temp banned before, and I have reallly been focusing on being less toxic since then. If i lose my account for this I have to imagine that not only is it messed up in the fact I was the victim(clearly shown by the chat logs) but it will also be a real disappointment to me because I love the game. Please try to get this resolved ASAP so I can get back on the rift.

Chat logs for your reference: 
Game 1 
Crown TSM: lol you banning fiora ctually lost us the game 
Crown TSM: i would of wrecked him 
Crown TSM: plz report lux 
Crown TSM: she is trying to lose us the game and she called me a %%%%%% 
Crown TSM: im black yes 
Crown TSM: more than enough to report 
Crown TSM: and she banned my champ 
Crown TSM: wow this game is sooo over 
Crown TSM: plz end 
Crown TSM: not much fun when your mid trolls and bans your champ 
Crown TSM: gg

replies.body:
Well, it's definitely not okay for someone to be calling others racist comments like that, but it's also not much better to fight back with more intensity either. The best route to take is the high road. Report them to send them our way to deal with on your behalf. 

With that being said, you're more than welcome to reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to discuss this a little more and see if anything can be done!
Unfortunately, you have to remake it. We do not have the ability to move threads without deleting them.

Heya Crown,

This actually would be better placed in [Player Behavior](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation). That board handles cases like what you have in the OP. This board is mainly for technical issues regarding league.

Thanks,

Galacius
Can i transfer it or do I have to remake it?
riot dgaf about u, they will ban u kick u on the ground and tell u its fair
Well im hoping by bringing this to their attention they will fix it.
